desc.en: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.thai: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.ko: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_tw: 老師被白子救出來後，抵達阿拜多斯高中的廢校對策委員會社團活動室。然而當時片方頭盔團卻來攻擊阿拜多斯高中， 於是老師就和學生們一起出面擊退他們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: At the moment when Sensei found himself out of options, Sensei met Shiroko.
desc.jp: At the moment when Sensei found himself out of options, Sensei met Shiroko.
desc.thai: At the moment when Sensei found himself out of options, Sensei met Shiroko.
desc.ko: At the moment when Sensei found himself out of options, Sensei met Shiroko.
desc.zh_tw: 就在老師窮途末路之際，老師遇到了白子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了白子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了白子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了白子。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 【白子遇到老师的动画】

hobby.zh_tw: 慢跑、鍛鍊體力、騎自行車
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 慢跑、锻炼体力、骑自行车
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 慢跑、锻炼体力、骑自行车
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 慢跑、锻炼体力、骑自行车

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.jp: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.thai: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.ko: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.zh_tw: 老師在遇見了白子之後，向白子表示自己是來出差的，但苦於找不到路。白子表示周邊地區均已廢棄，並向老師遞能量飲料喝。之後，白子背著老師到達了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 将老师背到对策委员会办公室后，老师向众人表明了自己是夏莱老师的身份。

desc.en: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.jp: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.thai: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.ko: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.zh_tw: 就在眾人準備討論事務時，外面突然響起槍聲，原來是頭盔圈又來進攻阿拜多斯了。眾人立刻開始作戰，老師則留在辦公室進行指揮。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在办公室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在办公室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在办公室进行指挥。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.thai: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.ko: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_tw: 擊敗頭盔團重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會學生們，再次向老師自我介紹。在老師的幫助下，學校的補給問題已順利解決，這讓學生們非常開心。大夥們想趁勢破壞片方頭盔團的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.jp: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.thai: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.ko: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.zh_tw: 在擊退頭盔圈後，眾人對老師剛剛的指揮感到讚歎不已；之後眾人分別介紹了自己。星野此時提出要去襲擊頭盔圈的前哨基地，老師表示同意，眾人立刻出發。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己。星野此时提出要去袭击头盔圈的前哨基地，老师表示同意，众人立刻出发。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己。星野此时提出要去袭击头盔圈的前哨基地，老师表示同意，众人立刻出发。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己。星野此时提出要去袭击头盔圈的前哨基地，老师表示同意，众人立刻出发。

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.thai: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.ko: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_tw: 老師聽說阿拜多斯高中欠下的債務超過9億日圓，僅靠學生 的力量。光是償還利息就喘不過氣。老師雖想幫忙學生，但是茜香卻生氣地表示自己信不過大人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生 的力量。光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生 的力量。光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生 的力量。光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.thai: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.ko: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.zh_tw: 回到學校後，眾人向老師道謝，卻不小心說出了還債一事。茜香表示對老師不太信任，因而不太願意討論這個話題，選擇離開，日步美跟隨前往。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，日步美跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，日步美跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，日步美跟随前往。

desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.jp: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.thai: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.ko: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.zh_tw: 從星野和綾音口中，老師獲知了阿拜多斯欠下9億6235萬元債務的事情，並且得知阿拜多斯地區近年經常發生沙塵暴，學校雖投入大量資金卻仍無法逆轉；由於沒有銀行願意為他們貸款，他們不得不轉向高利貸公司，但沙漠化越來越嚴重，債務水漲船高，償還無望，導致很多學生離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
